1.「何度も往復させて すまんな <pc>。| ふたりが 破邪の秘技の試練に向かう前: Sorry for all the back and forth,|<pc>. There's something I must tell you|both before undergoing the trials.

2.「レビュール街道北の 王家の墓の下に| 人知れず広がる 迷宮についての話だ。: I'm talking about the maze that lies|hidden beneath the Royal Tomb on the north|Reviewle Highway.

3.「その名を…… 王家の迷宮と言う。: It is called... the Royal Maze.

4.「王家の迷宮……。| 聞いたことがありませんが それは？: The Royal Maze...? I've never heard of it|before. What is it?

5.「王家の者でも 知る者は限られている。| 勇者とその盟友がそろった 今だからこそ: Only few among the royal family know what it|is. Now that the Hero and ally are together,|I decided to reveal its existence.

6.「今の ふたりの修行の場として| 最も適切であると 判断したからだ。: I've also decided that it's the most|appropriate place for you two to train|together.

7.「ふたりの修行の場……。: A place for us to train together...

8.「アンルシアが 破邪の秘技を会得したとて| そなたたち自身が 強くならなければ|: Even if Anlucia masters the Sacred Skills...|It still won't be easy going up against the|demons. You must become stronger.

9.「だが 王家の迷宮に 挑むことで| 勇者と盟友は さらなる成長を 望めるだろう。: By braving the Royal Maze, you both will be|able to grow stronger. Therefore, I will open|its doors.

10.「現世と霊界の狭間にある 王家の迷宮に挑むには| 肉体という衣を脱ぎ 精神体と化: The maze lies between our world and the world|of spirits. You must leave your physical body|behind. Think of this as a doorway for that.

11.「扉の向こうは 王家の墓へと つながっている。| 中に入ったら 奥にある大扉をく: This door will lead to the Royal Maze. Once|there, the giant door you see will lead you|further into the maze's depths.

12.「……さて。実際に 行く前に| いくつか 王家の迷宮について| 聞いておいてもら: But before you go, there are a few things you|should keep in mind.

13.「この迷宮に入れるのは 勇者と盟友| そして 盟友の従える魔物のみだ。| 旅の仲: Only the Hero, their ally, and the ally's|monster companions may enter. Support|companions are not permitted to enter.

14.「それと 探索の途中で 迷宮の外に出る時は| この うつしよのカギが必要になる。: Also, when you finishing exploring the maze,|you will need this World Key. I will leave|it in your care.

18.<color_yellow>迷宮に入るには 勇気の輝石が必要です。|勇気の輝石は: <color_yellow>Entering the maze will require Courage Augite.|You can get 15 of them per week, and you can|check how many you have at this door.

19.「ありがとうございます ルシェンダさま。| 私と <pc>のふたりは| 王家の迷: Thank you, Lushenda. <pc> and|I will definitely use the Royal Maze to train|ourselves.

20.「王家の迷宮は 未知なる領域だ。| 少しずつ チカラをつけながら| 徐々に進んで: What lies in the maze is not well known. It's|best to progress gradually as you continue|to gain more strength.

21.「……その果てに 何が待つのかは| まだ 誰にも わからない。| 決して 無理は: No one knows for sure what lies at the end|of it... don't push yourselves too hard.

23.<color_yellow>光の扉からは アンルシアの|装備変更や スキル振り分: <color_yellow>From this door you may also change Anlucia's|equipment as well as allocate her skill|points.
